metadata.dc:author: Ramos, A P
García, L P
metadata.dc:description: Toxoplasmposis is one of the zoonotic diseases which is widely spread all over the world. It is caused by Toxoplasma gondii. In this paper we made a chronological synthesis of some of the numerous investigations that have been made in the world and in Cuba.
metadata.dc:title: Reseña histórica acerca de las investigaciones relacionadas con la toxoplasmosis.
[Historical review about the research on toxoplasmosis].
